page.title: 07A Typical School Day
page.content: A typical school day starts at 9 a.m. with an Assembly when the children have a short service and sometimes show each other their work. After Assembly the children usually have a Mathematical activity for about 40 minutes. After that they have a Language activity such as Creative Writing, Comprehension, Cloze Procedure or a Discussion. The rest of the day can be spent on wide variety of activities including Topic Work, Art, P.E., Swimming, work on the two Computers, Country Dancing and Drama. Sometimes the children go on visits often staying away for a day or two in hotels or on a camp site.
